name: Never Study Late Alone
description:
You fall asleep while studying hard. As you wake up, you notice that all the lights are off and entrance door is locked. You must find a key and make your way home.

New Features

  • Changed the main theme
  • Fixed some stuff that doesn't respond correctly when pressed E
  • More jumpscares
  • More objects and sounds that will fill the atmosphere

Thanks for playing!!

Contact me: paincide@gmail.com
